TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi sealed beforefieldinit TreeWalker extends System.Object

summary.span: 提供用于导航 UI 自动化树的方法和属性。

span.span: Provides methods and properties used to navigate the UI Automation tree.

remarks.format: ## Remarks UI 自动化客户端查看[!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_uiautomation](~/includes/tla2sharptla-uiautomation-md.md)]元素作为一套桌面上排列的树状结构中的对象。UI Automation clients view the [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_uiautomation](~/includes/tla2sharptla-uiautomation-md.md)] elements on the desktop as a set of objects arranged in a tree structure. 使用类，客户端应用程序可以导航[!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_uiautomation](~/includes/tla2sharptla-uiautomation-md.md)]按选择的树视图，并从一个单步执行树到另一个在指定的方向使用， ， ，，和方法。Using the class, a client application can navigate the [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_uiautomation](~/includes/tla2sharptla-uiautomation-md.md)] tree by selecting a view of the tree and stepping from one to another in a specified direction using the , , , , and methods. 导航[!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_uiautomation](~/includes/tla2sharptla-uiautomation-md.md)]树进行可能导致跨进程调用且不是与查找元素使用一样有效或方法。Navigating the [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_uiautomation](~/includes/tla2sharptla-uiautomation-md.md)] tree using can result in cross-process calls and is not as efficient as locating an element using the or methods. 如果客户端应用程序可能会尝试在其自己的用户界面中查找元素，则必须进行所有[!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_uiautomation](~/includes/tla2sharptla-uiautomation-md.md)]的单独线程上调用。If your client application might try to find elements in its own user interface, you must make all [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_uiautomation](~/includes/tla2sharptla-uiautomation-md.md)] calls on a separate thread.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig specialname rtspecialname instance void .ctor(class System.Windows.Automation.Condition condition) cil managed

param.name: condition
param.span: 将要导航的 [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_uiautomation](~/includes/tla2sharptla-uiautomation-md.md)]元素目录树的视图。

span.span: The view of the [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_uiautomation](~/includes/tla2sharptla-uiautomation-md.md)] element tree that will navigate.

summary.span: 初始化 类的新实例。

span.span: Initializes a new instance of the class.

remarks.format: ## Remarks [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_uiautomation](~/includes/tla2sharptla-uiautomation-md.md)] 不匹配的元素`condition`跳过时用于在元素树中导航。 elements that do not match `condition` are skipped over when is used to navigate the element tree. 如果客户端应用程序可能会尝试在其自己的用户界面中查找元素，则必须进行所有[!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_uiautomation](~/includes/tla2sharptla-uiautomation-md.md)]的单独线程上调用。If your client application might try to find elements in its own user interface, you must make all [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_uiautomation](~/includes/tla2sharptla-uiautomation-md.md)] calls on a separate thread. ## Examples 下面的示例演示如何可以构造仅在启用元素之间导航。The following example shows how you can construct a that navigates only among enabled elements. [!code-csharp[UIAClient_snip#174](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Wpf/UIAClient_snip/CSharp/ClientForm.cs#174)] [!code-vb[UIAClient_snip#174](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Wpf/UIAClient_snip/VisualBasic/ClientForm.vb#174)]

MemberSignature.Value: Public ReadOnly Property Condition As Condition
public: property System::Windows::Automation::Condition ^ Condition { System::Windows::Automation::Condition ^ get(); };

span.span: Gets the object that defines the view for the object.
The condition that defines the view.

value.span: 这是传递给构造函数的值。

span.span: This is the value that was passed to the constructor.

summary.span: 表示一个预定义的 ，其中包含目录树中标记为内容控件的元素的视图。

span.span: Represents a predefined containing a view of elements in the tree that are marked as content controls.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果客户端应用程序可能会尝试在其自己的用户界面中查找元素，则必须进行所有[!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_uiautomation](~/includes/tla2sharptla-uiautomation-md.md)]的单独线程上调用。If your client application might try to find elements in its own user interface, you must make all [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_uiautomation](~/includes/tla2sharptla-uiautomation-md.md)] calls on a separate thread. ## Examples 下面的示例演示用于构造的子树中的元素的树视图。The following example shows being used to construct a tree view of elements in a subtree. 使用情况相同。The usage for is identical. [!code-csharp[UIAClient_snip#171](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Wpf/UIAClient_snip/CSharp/ClientForm.cs#171)] [!code-vb[UIAClient_snip#171](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Wpf/UIAClient_snip/VisualBasic/ClientForm.vb#171)]

Public Shared ReadOnly ControlViewWalker As TreeWalker

summary.span: 表示一个预定义的 ，其中包含目录树中标记为控件的元素的视图。

span.span: Represents a predefined containing a view of elements in the tree that are marked as controls.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果客户端应用程序可能会尝试在其自己的用户界面中查找元素，则必须进行所有[!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_uiautomation](~/includes/tla2sharptla-uiautomation-md.md)]的单独线程上调用。If your client application might try to find elements in its own user interface, you must make all [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_uiautomation](~/includes/tla2sharptla-uiautomation-md.md)] calls on a separate thread. ## Examples 下面的示例演示用于构造的子树中的元素的树视图。The following example shows being used to construct a tree view of elements in a subtree. [!code-csharp[UIAClient_snip#171](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Wpf/UIAClient_snip/CSharp/ClientForm.cs#171)] [!code-vb[UIAClient_snip#171](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Wpf/UIAClient_snip/VisualBasic/ClientForm.vb#171)]

summary.span: 检索指定 的第一个子元素。

span.span: Retrieves the first child element of the specified .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 可以拥有其他子元素，与当前视图条件不匹配，因此导航元素树时将不会返回。An can have additional child elements that do not match the current view condition and thus are not returned when navigating the element tree. 结构树更改作为可见[!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_ui](~/includes/tlasharptla-ui-md.md)]的桌面的更改上的元素。The structure of the tree changes as the visible [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_ui](~/includes/tlasharptla-ui-md.md)] elements on the desktop change. 不保证元素返回的第一个子元素将在后续处理过程返回作为第一个子级。It is not guaranteed that an element returned as the first child element will be returned as the first child on subsequent passes.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig instance class System.Windows.Automation.AutomationElement GetFirstChild(class System.Windows.Automation.AutomationElement element) cil managed
Public Function GetFirstChild (element As AutomationElement) As AutomationElement

param.name: element
param.span: 从中检索第一个子级的元素。

span.span: The element from which to retrieve the first child.

summary.span: 检索指定 的第一个子元素。

span.span: Retrieves the first child element of the specified .

returns.span: 第一个子元素，或者，如果不存在此类元素，则为 null 引用（[!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_visualbnet](~/includes/tlasharptla-visualbnet-md.md)] 中为 ）。

span.span: The first child element, or a null reference ( in [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_visualbnet](~/includes/tlasharptla-visualbnet-md.md)]) if there is no such element.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 可以拥有其他子元素，与当前视图条件不匹配，因此导航元素树时将不会返回。An can have additional child elements that do not match the current view condition and thus are not returned when navigating the element tree. 结构树更改作为可见[!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_ui](~/includes/tlasharptla-ui-md.md)]的桌面的更改上的元素。The structure of the tree changes as the visible [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_ui](~/includes/tlasharptla-ui-md.md)] elements on the desktop change. 不保证元素返回的第一个子元素将在后续处理过程返回作为第一个子级。It is not guaranteed that an element returned as the first child element will be returned as the first child on subsequent passes. ## Examples 下面的示例演示用于构造的子树中的元素的树视图。The following example shows being used to construct a tree view of elements in a subtree. [!code-csharp[UIAClient_snip#171](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Wpf/UIAClient_snip/CSharp/ClientForm.cs#171)] [!code-vb[UIAClient_snip#171](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Wpf/UIAClient_snip/VisualBasic/ClientForm.vb#171)]

Public Function GetFirstChild (element As AutomationElement, request As CacheRequest) As AutomationElement

param.name: element
param.span: 从中检索第一个子级的元素。

span.span: The element from which to retrieve the first child.

param.name: request
param.span: 一个缓存请求对象，它指定返回的 上要进行缓存的属性和模式。

span.span: A cache request object specifying properties and patterns on the returned to cache.

summary.span: 检索指定的 的第一个子元素并缓存属性和模式。

span.span: Retrieves the first child element of the specified and caches properties and patterns.

returns.span: 第一个子元素，或者，如果不存在此类元素，则为 null 引用（[!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_visualbnet](~/includes/tlasharptla-visualbnet-md.md)] 中为 ）。

remarks.format: ## Remarks 可以拥有其他子元素，与当前视图条件不匹配，因此导航元素树时将不会返回。An can have additional child elements that do not match the current view condition and thus are not returned when navigating the element tree. 结构树更改作为可见[!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_ui](~/includes/tlasharptla-ui-md.md)]的桌面的更改上的元素。The structure of the tree changes as the visible [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_ui](~/includes/tlasharptla-ui-md.md)] elements on the desktop change. 不保证元素返回的第一个子元素将在后续处理过程返回作为第一个子级。It is not guaranteed that an element returned as the first child element will be returned as the first child on subsequent passes.

Public Function GetParent (element As AutomationElement, request As CacheRequest) As AutomationElement

span.span: The element whose parent is to be returned.

param.name: request
param.span: 一个缓存请求对象，它指定返回的 上要进行缓存的成员。

span.span: A cache request object specifying members on the returned to cache.

summary.span: 检索指定的 的父元素并缓存属性和模式。

span.span: Retrieves the parent element of the specified and caches properties and patterns.

returns.span: 父元素，或者，如果指定元素为目录树中的根元素或者父元素在此视图中不可见，则为 null 引用（在 [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_visualbnet](~/includes/tlasharptla-visualbnet-md.md)] 中为 ）。

remarks.format: ## Remarks 结构树更改作为可见[!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_ui](~/includes/tlasharptla-ui-md.md)]的桌面的更改上的元素。The structure of the tree changes as the visible [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_ui](~/includes/tlasharptla-ui-md.md)] elements on the desktop change. 不保证元素返回父元素作为父级返回在后续处理过程。It is not guaranteed that an element returned as the parent element will be returned as the parent on subsequent passes.

summary.span: 检索指定 的上一同级元素。

span.span: Retrieves the previous sibling of the specified .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 可以具有其他同级元素，它们不匹配的当前视图状态，因此导航元素树时将不会返回。An can have additional sibling elements that do not match the current view condition and thus are not returned when navigating the element tree. 结构树更改作为可见[!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_ui](~/includes/tlasharptla-ui-md.md)]的桌面的更改上的元素。The structure of the tree changes as the visible [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_ui](~/includes/tlasharptla-ui-md.md)] elements on the desktop change. 不保证元素返回上一个同级元素将在后续处理过程返回为上一个同级。It is not guaranteed that an element returned as the previous sibling element will be returned as the previous sibling on subsequent passes.

span.span: The previous sibling element, or a null reference ( in [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_visualbnet](~/includes/tlasharptla-visualbnet-md.md)]) if there is no such element.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 可以具有其他同级元素，它们不匹配的当前视图状态，因此导航元素树时将不会返回。An can have additional sibling elements that do not match the current view condition and thus are not returned when navigating the element tree. 结构树更改作为可见[!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_ui](~/includes/tlasharptla-ui-md.md)]的桌面的更改上的元素。The structure of the tree changes as the visible [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_ui](~/includes/tlasharptla-ui-md.md)] elements on the desktop change. 不保证元素返回上一个同级元素将在后续处理过程返回为上一个同级。It is not guaranteed that an element returned as the previous sibling element will be returned as the previous sibling on subsequent passes.

Public Function GetPreviousSibling (element As AutomationElement, request As CacheRequest) As AutomationElement

param.name: element
param.span: 从中检索上一个同级的元素。

span.span: The element from which to retrieve the previous sibling.

param.name: request
param.span: 一个缓存请求对象，它指定返回的 上要进行缓存的属性和模式。

span.span: A cache request object specifying properties and patterns on the returned to cache.

summary.span: 检索指定的 的上一个同级并缓存属性和模式。

span.span: Retrieves the previous sibling of the specified and caches properties and patterns.

returns.span: 上一个同级元素，或者，如果不存在此类元素，则为 null 引用（[!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_visualbnet](~/includes/tlasharptla-visualbnet-md.md)] 中为 ）。

span.span: The previous sibling element, or a null reference ( in [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_visualbnet](~/includes/tlasharptla-visualbnet-md.md)]) if there is no such element.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 可以具有其他同级元素，它们不匹配的当前视图状态，因此导航元素树时将不会返回。An can have additional sibling elements that do not match the current view condition and thus are not returned when navigating the element tree. 结构树更改作为可见[!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_ui](~/includes/tlasharptla-ui-md.md)]的桌面的更改上的元素。The structure of the tree changes as the visible [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_ui](~/includes/tlasharptla-ui-md.md)] elements on the desktop change. 不保证元素返回上一个同级元素将在后续处理过程返回为上一个同级。It is not guaranteed that an element returned as the previous sibling element will be returned as the previous sibling on subsequent passes.

summary.span: 在 的此实例所使用的树视图中检索与指定的 最接近的上级元素。

span.span: Retrieves the ancestor element nearest to the specified in the tree view used by this instance of .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 对元素进行规范化通过之前满足的视图条件的元素在祖先一系列在树中向上导航达到对象。The element is normalized by navigating up the ancestor chain in the tree until an element that satisfies the view condition for the object is reached. 如果到达的根元素，即使它不满足视图条件，则返回的根元素。If the root element is reached, the root element is returned even if it does not satisfy the view condition. 此方法可用于获取对引用的应用程序[!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_uiautomation](~/includes/tla2sharptla-uiautomation-md.md)]的命中测试的元素。This method is useful for applications that obtain references to [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_uiautomation](~/includes/tla2sharptla-uiautomation-md.md)] elements by hit-testing. 应用程序可能想要仅使用特定类型的元素，并且可以使用，确保无论最初检索到哪些元素，（例如，当滚动条获取输入的焦点），（如内容相关的元素最终检索元素）。The application might want to work only with specific types of elements, and can use to make sure that no matter what element is initially retrieved (for example, when a scroll bar gets the input focus), only the element of interest (such as a content element) is ultimately retrieved.

span.span: If the navigation up the ancestor chain reaches the root element, the root element is returned.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 对元素进行规范化通过之前满足的视图条件的元素在祖先一系列在树中向上导航达到对象。The element is normalized by navigating up the ancestor chain in the tree until an element that satisfies the view condition for the object is reached. 如果到达的根元素，即使它不满足视图条件，则返回的根元素。If the root element is reached, the root element is returned even if it does not satisfy the view condition. 此方法可用于获取对引用的应用程序[!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_uiautomation](~/includes/tla2sharptla-uiautomation-md.md)]的命中测试的元素。This method is useful for applications that obtain references to [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_uiautomation](~/includes/tla2sharptla-uiautomation-md.md)] elements by hit-testing. 应用程序可能想要仅使用特定类型的元素，并且可以使用，确保无论最初检索到哪些元素，（例如，当滚动条获取输入的焦点），（如内容相关的元素最终检索元素）。The application might want to work only with specific types of elements, and can use to make sure that no matter what element is initially retrieved (for example, when a scroll bar gets the input focus), only the element of interest (such as a content element) is ultimately retrieved.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 对元素进行规范化通过之前满足的视图条件的元素在祖先一系列在树中向上导航达到对象。The element is normalized by navigating up the ancestor chain in the tree until an element that satisfies the view condition for the object is reached. 如果到达的根元素，即使它不满足视图条件，则返回的根元素。If the root element is reached, the root element is returned even if it does not satisfy the view condition. 此方法可用于获取对引用的应用程序[!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_uiautomation](~/includes/tla2sharptla-uiautomation-md.md)]的命中测试的元素。This method is useful for applications that obtain references to [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_uiautomation](~/includes/tla2sharptla-uiautomation-md.md)] elements by hit-testing. 应用程序可能想要仅使用特定类型的元素，并且可以使用，确保无论最初检索到哪些元素，（例如，当滚动条获取输入的焦点），（如内容相关的元素最终检索元素）。The application might want to work only with specific types of elements, and can use to make sure that no matter what element is initially retrieved (for example, when a scroll bar gets the input focus), only the element of interest (such as a content element) is ultimately retrieved.

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static initonly class System.Windows.Automation.TreeWalker RawViewWalker
Public Shared ReadOnly RawViewWalker As TreeWalker

summary.span: 表示一个预定义的 ，其中包含目录树中所有元素的视图。

span.span: Represents a predefined containing a view of all the elements in the tree.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果客户端应用程序可能会尝试在其自己的用户界面中查找元素，则必须进行所有[!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_uiautomation](~/includes/tla2sharptla-uiautomation-md.md)]的单独线程上调用。If your client application might try to find elements in its own user interface, you must make all [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_uiautomation](~/includes/tla2sharptla-uiautomation-md.md)] calls on a separate thread. ## Examples 下面的示例演示用于构造的子树中的元素的树视图。The following example shows being used to construct a tree view of elements in a subtree. 使用情况相同。The usage for is identical. [!code-csharp[UIAClient_snip#171](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Wpf/UIAClient_snip/CSharp/ClientForm.cs#171)] [!code-vb[UIAClient_snip#171](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Wpf/UIAClient_snip/VisualBasic/ClientForm.vb#171)]
